data.text: This hotel is amazing, from the warm welcome by the front desk team to a drink while you check in. Eddie checked us in and was very knowledgeable about the city and all the places to stop by.  Although our room did not have a view of the city, it was lovely.  I found my happy place in the jetted bathtub, and this hotel pays attention to the details and provides bath salts for your bubble bath concert moment. We were given dinner recommendations by the front desk team in the evening, and 9reinas almost brought tears to my eyes about how good the food was. The breakfast team were so welcoming and made sure everyone was well looked after, and the breakfast was incredibly yummy. If you are staying in this hotel, do not miss an opportunity to use the spa. Anais has gifted hands, and I felt floating on cloud nine after my secret massage. The Mayan Suana was a treat, and I enjoyed the chromotherapy shower, which was a unique experience.
data.title: An oasis in a gorgeous city

data.text:
Wonderfully friendly and attentive staff. On arrival we were offered a couple of glasses of Cava, which was very nice. Our bed was made up twice on one day, and there appears to be a turndown service in the evening with a chocolate. Complimentary minibar with cokes, a couple of beers and some water. The room and ensuite were kept very clean. Excellent position for all the main tourist locations and public transport. On my partner's birthday we arrived back after a long day to find a complimentary bottle of cava in the room.

We are light sleepers, and I'm pleased to report the hotel is very quiet during the night, and we slept well.

The room safe is large enough to take a 17" laptop and easily supports multiple iPads, phones etc.

I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel to friends visiting Barcelona. Well done and thank you to the team for a memorable stay.
data.title: Wonderfully friendly and attentive staff at a very nice well-positioned hotel.

data.text:
The location in Eixample is very convenient for visiting Casa Mila & Casa Batllo.  The hotel’s owner has an extensive collection of Egyptian art as well as a museum nearby the hotel ( free for hotel guests).
All of the staff were extremely welcoming and helpful.  I was traveling with my grandchild and both of us loved the hotel.  We felt very safe in this area. I highly recommend staying here if you go to Barcelona.
data.title: Fabulous hotel!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you very much for this glowing review.

It is a delight to know that our central location in Eixample provided you with the convenience of exploring the architectural marvels of Casa Mila and Casa Batllo. Our owner's extensive collection of Egyptian art is indeed a point of pride, and we are pleased that you appreciated the complimentary access to the nearby museum.

Our team is thrilled to hear that their efforts to be welcoming and helpful made a lasting impression on you and your grandchild. It is always our priority to ensure that our guests feel safe and well-cared for during their stay.

Your recommendation is the highest compliment we can receive, and we are honoured that you would recommend Claris Hotel & Spa to others visiting Barcelona.

It would be a pleasure to welcome you back in the future. 
All the best,

Remei Gómez, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text:
Was a fair stay but expected a bit more space for having upgraded to a junior suite. Bathroom was cramped and a step down was dangerous.

Breakfast didn't taste of anything and coffee was poor/weak for having spent so much money.
data.title: Nice hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for taking the time to review your recent experience.

We regret to hear that the junior suite did not meet your expectations in terms of space. Our hotel aims to deliver exceptional experiences, and we are genuinely disheartened when a guest's stay does not reflect our commitment to luxury and comfort.
 
Regarding the bathroom design, we understand your concern about the step down and would like to note that each room's layout is intentionally unique, blending form and function to create a memorable atmosphere.

Your remarks on the breakfast experience are taken with the utmost seriousness. Our selection usually garners high praise for its variety and freshness, and it is disappointing to learn that it fell short of impressing you. 

Similarly, it is unfortunate that our coffee did not meet the robustness you were looking for, as we strive to cater to a wide range of preferences with our premium offerings.

We look forward to welcoming you back. 
Best wishes,

Remei Gómez, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: Great hotel ! Nice room, rooftop bar and a good location. The breakfast was good with plenty of choice and all hot food made to order. We had excellent service from the breakfast staff in particular. We also ate at the hotel’s Japanese restaurant which also had good food and excellent service. I would happily recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to visit Barcelona.
data.title: Great hotel - would recommend!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you very much for this glowing review.

It is wonderful to hear that your accommodation was to your satisfaction and that our rooftop bar provided an enjoyable atmosphere. 

Your kind words about the variety and quality of our breakfast offerings are much appreciated, as is your praise for the attentive service provided by our breakfast staff.

Furthermore, we are delighted that you had a positive dining experience at our Japanese restaurant, where we strive to deliver both excellent food and service.

Your recommendation is the highest compliment we can receive, and we are grateful for it.

It would be a pleasure to welcome you back in the future. 
All the best,

Remei Gómez, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager
